changelog.release_notes: Updated for Hive's new API, so all should be working :)
Added support for viewing Hot Water status (if your system has Hot Water)

Updated to finally work with Hive's new API's

Thanks for all your help in testing :)

This is an update to the Hive Pebble app on Pebble and Pebble Steel 
NEW FEATURES Boost has now been added, set it from the Control Menu (hold the middle button) then to start Boost hold down the bottom button. Shows which mode your heating is in, bottom left corner (O=OFF, M=Manual, S=Schedule). 
BUG FIXES Fixed a bug with temperatures below 7degrees showing the snowflake. Fixed a bug when in Schedule mode and manually changing the temperature changed the mode the Manual.
Just a few bug fixes for the colour version of the app

Added .5 increment on target temperature 

Updated colour UI for the new Pebble Time / Pebble Time Steel 
(please go to settings to select your watch to see the colourful UI.

Added a menu to select different modes (OFF, SCHEDULE, MANUAL) 
-- to access the menu hold down the SELECT button 

Added icons for Frost Protection and Boiler status and fixed a few bugs
First release of the Hive pebble app to control British Gas's Hive Heating System

data.description:
Connects and controls the Hive Heating system by British Gas

Any problems don't hesitate to email and ask.

The information you provide e.g username/password is stored on your phone and can only be accessed by Hivepebble.
